299,http://www.armslist.com/posts/1760299,For Trade:  Trade only: Classic Rare Custom Sako L46 Bench Rifle,"Aurora, Denver, Colorado",Offer,"Listed On: Friday, June 14, 2013",Rifles,Sako                                                                                 ,222 Remington                                                                                ,Single Shot                                                                                ,Rifle,"Sako Custom L-46 .222 in collectible conditiion

The L-46 model was first produced in 1946. In the early 50's, a few Sakos (Sock-0) and Sako-built Ithacas were sold in the US and were soon noted for their quality. Sako began offering bare actions and barrels for sale to gunsmiths and many custom rifles were built during the 50's.

Most L-46 actions were machined with a magazine well, which was pinned shut with a plate if the gunsmith wanted a single shot, or bench, rifle. A few, like this one, were machined without the magazine well, and were specifically built for the growing sport of bench shooting.
The custom adjustable trigger can, and is, set for a pull force measured in ounces.
The Weaver K8F scope is an original build option
Straight grained Black Walnut stock with glass bedding

322,http://www.armslist.com/posts/1760322,For Sale:  Smith & Wesson 500 4 inch Barrel.,"Heights, Billings, Montana","$ 1,100","Listed On: Friday, June 14, 2013",Handguns,Smith & Wesson                                                                                ,500 S&W                                                                                ,Double / Single Action,no type,"Only shot a total of 6 times. Pretty much brand new.

In 2003 the gunsmiths and engineers at Smith & Wesson wanted to deliver maximum power for serious handgun hunters. The power they sought required an entirely new frame, the massive ""X-Frame™,"" and was the basis for the new Model S&W500™, the most powerful production revolver in the world.  This ushered in the era of the ""big gun"" and was only the beginning.   For ultimate power and velocity there's nothing even close to an X-Frame model handgun.

Featuring all the timeless style of an American original and sharing the proud heritage of the legendary Desert Eagle, the new .45 ACP 1911 from Magnum Research comes fully equipped with topof- the-line custom features at a basic model price that blows away the competition.

The Desert Eagle 1911 single action models are available in two barrel lengths, 5” and 4.33” and are shipped with two 8 round magazines with extended base pads for positive magazine insertion. The frame is precision cast and machined from high quality carbon steel and the slide is machined from solid billets of steel than finished in a matte black. The Desert Eagle 1911 comes loaded with outstanding features that would cost extra from a custom gunsmith. Some of these features include a high-ride beavertail grip safety, extended magazine release, aluminum trigger with an overtravel stop, stainless steel full-length guide rod, extended thumb safety, enlarged ejection port, beveled magazine well and double-diamond checkered wood grips held in place by stainless steel hex screws.
Sights High profile sculptured rear sight, drift adjustable for windage, pinned in front sight blade with horizontal serrations
THIS IS A CASH/EQUIVALENT PRICE.  A SLIGHT ADDITIONAL COST WILL APPLY FOR CREDIT CARD ORDERS.

THIS IS A SALE AS INDICATED ABOVE AND WE WILL NOT BE ENTERTAINING TRADES AT THIS TIME."

945,http://www.armslist.com/posts/1760945,For Sale/Trade:    Browning Hi Power .30 caliber / 7.65mm Luger - Belgian Made,"South end - Littleton, Highlands Ranch, Colorado, United States","$ 1,100","Listed On: Thursday, June 20, 2013",Handguns,Browning                                                                                ,30 Luger                                                                                ,Single Action,no type,"Browning Hi Power polished blue 7.65mm / .30 caliber luger with a 4-21/32” barrel, fixed sites and original everything (see images).  I am the first owner and bought it in April of 1989.  I have put a max of 250-250 rounds of 9mm through it via a 9mm Hi Power conversion barrel and it is highly accurate.  The original .30 cal barrel (which I’ve never shot) has been put back in, and the gun is as I bought it 24 years ago.

According to Bowers Tactical on Yosemite in Centennial it was manufactured in the mid 1980’s in Belgium.  This is verified by the slide that actually states that it was made in Belgium and the Belgian acceptance stamp / proof mark on the trigger guard (see images).  It has an external extractor that, according to Bowers, dates it as second generation (Mark II and the technician said it was released solo and not as part of a set).

Bowers evaluates it as being in great condition at 95% (has a couple light scratches - see images) and after consulting their hardcopy gun guide, the technician told me that last year it was valued at around $1,100 and recommended I should put it online for between $1,200-1,500.

Email for more pictures if you’d like.  It comes with the original box with all markings and two stamped polished blue 7.65mm magazines (13 rounds staggered) and a silver one that is not stamped, but is identical in capacity (see images).  Before I realized I wanted to sell, I spent $30 on Hogue wraparound rubber grips (super comfortable), which I’ll throw in as well - but the gun does come with the original grips.  I’ll also include the 9mm conversion barrel, but just for show – Bowers recommends not using it because it’s too thin and could be dangerous (another reason I converted it back to 7.65mm / .30 cal).

Many Browning Hi Powers were manufactured in a variety locations but this is a legitimate, fully Belgian piece I’m looking for a serious collector who recognizes its unique nature.  You will need to fill out a bill of sale, have a valid Colorado ID, & be over 21years old.  No felons / bad guys.
Key Words: collector, rare, father's day, gift, antique, unique, unusual, limited, beautiful, classic"

997,http://www.armslist.com/posts/1760997,For Sale:  NIB Springfield XDS-9,"Monticello, Minneapolis / St. Paul, Minnesota",$ 550,"Listed On: Saturday, October 26, 2013",Handguns,Springfield                                                                                ,9mm Luger (9x19)                                                                                ,Double Action                                                                                ,Pistol,"NEW Springfield Armory XDS 9 MM

column2: Fiber Optic Front and Dovetail Rear (steel)

column1: Like all of models in our XD® line, the XD-S™ has all of the safety features to ensure your safety and the safety of those around you while handling the pistol.
The USA Trigger System™ guards against accidental discharge, from dropping or bumping it, by locking the trigger in place until direct rearward pressure is applied.
The Loaded Chamber Indicator allows the shooter to verify without a doubt, visually or by touch, that there is a round in the chamber.
All XD®, XD(M)® and XD-S™ models allows firing only when the shooter has a firm grip on the pistol.

The XD-S™ disassembles just like the XD®, however, with the XD-S™, the disassembly lever cannot be manipulated with a magazine in the pistol. Additionally, when the disassembly lever is up, a magazine cannot be inserted into the pistol.
The “all-terrain” look of the XD(M)® has proven to work so well that the texture has been enhanced for the XD-S™ with an even more pronounced texture to ensure your grip is always secure.

To preserve the safety and quality of your pistol, we’ve added a Melonite® finish on all XD® models for a deep penetrating finish that protects against corrosion. Also, our rugged case is as durable as the XD-S™ trademark it carries.

Superior design features give the XD-S™ capabilities that not all pistols of its size can claim. Making the XD-S™ easy and comfortable to fire is one the highest priorities of the XD® line. Many characteristics of the XD-S™ model are especially beneficial to those with a concealed carry license, like the less bulky frame and ability to customize the grip.

A single-position Picatinny rail readily accepts lights, lasers or other pistol accessories. It is one of the only polymer pistols of this size that has this feature, which makes it an easy reach for the light or laser of your choice.
The new XD-S™ trigger has a short travel along with a short reset which helps to keep you on target with greater ease for quicker, more accurate follow-up shots.
The rear sight on the XD-S™ is low-profile and holster friendly. Easier and faster target acquisition is achieved with a fiber optic front sight.

Making the XD-S™ easy and comfortable to fire is one the highest priorities of the XD® line. Many characteristics of the XD-S™ model are especially beneficial to those with a concealed carry license, like the less bulky frame and ability to customize the grip.

With two interchangeable backstraps, Springfield Armory® has stayed true to their focus on providing the user with the most comfortable, and easy to point pistol possible by allowing you to custom fit your grip.
The ideal grip angle of the XD-S™ is accented by the 1” single stack frame.

The serrations on the XD-S™ not only make this firearm more attractive, they are functional. The slightly rounded design, extending to the top of the slide, limits the possibility of a snag when drawing the pistol."
